item.title: Films watched in 2022
item.description: Satantango A seven hour long Hungarian film marathon by BÃ©la Tarr. This film is shown surprisingly often in London, usually with two intermissions. The Queen of Spades A quaint oldie film, fairly well done. The Room Watching this was a lot of fun. Big cult following at the cinema, the audience was shouting out every line. You get spoons when stepping in as well. Jackie Brown A Tartantino classic. Some say its his best, but apparently if you say this to Quentin’s face he’ll get angry at you.
